title: The Turn of the tide
creator_credit: Ian G Wallis and Kestrel Film Productions
brief_description: Discusses the ecology of the shore of Westernport Bay, Victoria, and the effects on it of waterfront settlement and development and consequent water pollution. Shows research on the problem in progress.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian G Wallis and Kestrel Film Productions
